title: Plan a Plant Turnaround Event
description: A shutdown planner is developing the master plan for a major plant turnaround, which involves hundreds of individual work orders.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all maintenance, inspection, and project work to be executed during the turnaround.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of all planned activities.

tasks.description: Use a planning tool to schedule all the activities, considering their durations, dependencies, and resource constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: The planner creates a detailed, integrated schedule for the entire event.

tasks.description: Run a critical path analysis on the turnaround schedule to identify the activities that will drive the overall duration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the critical path, which includes the replacement of a major vessel.
